column1: Observer lived in Wolverton, Carisbrooke Road
Exactly which one is uncertain but going by census and directories this seems to be about right
1940 Aug Zero inserted as no rain in south
1943 March 31st Note says gauge moved to Victoria Recreation Ground
The name at the top of the sheet says change happened in 1946
A note below says that it is more likely the move happened in 1943
Miss Morey, the observer died in 1943, so most likely that is when the move happened
